item.title: THE DAILY GRIND: AN IoT KG79 COFFEE GRINDER
item.description: Ground coffee is great. Grinding coffee is a pain. Having hand-ground coffee daily for years I was in the market for something quicker. The Delonghi KG79 is ideal in its price range Â£40 (not adjusted for cost of living crises etc.) adjustable dose adjustable grind size fairly inoffensive looking object you can fit a bag of coffee in the top requirements But the thing has it has flaws it’s very loud it grinds too much coffee at once What I wanted to do was
